column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Margaret - Thank you for your 5-star review! I'm beyond pleased we were able to assist you and your friend with our ramen
column2: and that our server took care of you during your visit. Perhaps in the future
column3: after extensive medical research and double-blind placebo studies
column4: we can one day tout the medicinal benefits of our ramen for curing hangovers. But until then
column5: we'll rely on anecdotal evidence! All jokes aside
column6: thanks for coming through and we look forward to serving you again soon!
